attributes.action: Ask the BBC to insist that Jeremy Clarkson apologise for his offensive remark against idiots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The news yesterday had representations from Scottish offended individuals and also representatives of the Blind, both of whom made their points regarding Jeremy's unfortunate comment regading'one eyed Scottish Idiot' So far no-one has complained on behalf of the Idiots who are also very offended. No idiot could possibly cause financial havoc on such a grand scale.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
